title: ‘Survivor,’ Season 42, Episode 7 With Steven Ruiz
description:
Riley and Juliet are joined by Steven Ruiz to discuss the latest episode of ‘Survivor.’ They break down all of Drea’s advantages, everyone’s strategy post-merge, and an all-time bad performance from Romeo. Plus, they talk about if this season is too similar to Season 41.

Hosts: Riley McAtee and Juliet Litman
Guest: Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Carlos Chiriboga
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
